He also sells curd made from his own cow’s milk.  Eladio is now requesting a loan to buy feed for the cows and to pay labor costs to clear the pastures.  He says the loan will help him because he will be able to better care for and feed his cows.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed and pay labor costs to clear the pasture.

loans.name: Mola

texts.en:
With his previous Kiva loan, Mola bought sacks of maize that he sold, increasing his working capital slightly. He was able to start a charcoal selling business, which has been so profitable. Now he is applying for a new Kiva loan because his sellers have requested more products for their established clientele, and Mola's working capital is insufficient to meet the growth in demand.

This is the reason why his Kiva loan will be successful, because he will respond to demand by buying sacks of charcoal at a good price. Mola tells the lenders that his Kiva loans have been very useful to him. He says thank you and may they continue helping him.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Fadia

texts.en: Fadia is a 47-year-old married woman who supports three family members from Al Bayader Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 800 JD to buy materials to make pastry to resell in her area.  In the future, she would like to expand her project to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make pastry to resell

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: Doña Dolores tiene 56 años de edad, tiene 9 hijos y vive con ellos y sus esposo en Taulabe, Comayagua.es una señora emprendedora que busca como ganarse la vida, anteriormente ella elaboraba pan y tamales para vender y hace 2 años estableció una pulpería para vender carnes, frijoles, arroz, maíz, sal, café, pan, churros, condimentos, jabón etc. Ella ha solicitado este préstamo que es por 7,000 Lempiras,  con el cual va surtir su negocio para mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos ya que del negocio ayuda a su hijo con los gastos de estudio. Tiene como propósito ayudar siempre a sus hijos que se gradúen.
texts.en: Dolores, 56, has nine children; she lives with them and her husband in Taulabe, Comayagua.  She’s an enterprising lady who seeks ways to earn a living.  She used to bake bread and make tamales to sell and two years ago opened a grocery store to sell meat, beans, rice, corn, salt, coffee, bread, snacks, condiment, soap, etc.  She’s requested a 7,000 Lempira loan to stock the store to improve sales and income because she helps pay her son’s schooling costs with income from the business.  Her goal is to always help her children graduate.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: Dolores, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en una colonia suburbana del municipio de San Pedro Sula. La actividad económica de Dolores es brindar servicio de belleza, siempre a realizado trabajos de corte de pelo, alisados, peinados, tintes, manicure, secados etc. este negocio lo tiene en su casa y ya tiene su clientela en el barrio. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 7,000 Lempiras y lo utilizara para comprar más producto que utiliza en el negocio y para vender a sus clientes como ser: tintes, champú, cremas, cremas alisadoras y otros productos de belleza, con el fin de ofrecer un mejor servicio y lo mejor al cliente.  Su meta es que su negocio crezca y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Dolores, 48, is a single mother; she has three children and lives in a suburban neighborhood in San Pedro Sula.  Dolores’ economic activity is providing beauty services.  She’s always worked doing haircuts, hair straightening, hair styling, hair coloring, manicures, hair drying, etc.  Her business is home-based and she has an established clientele in the neighborhood.

She requested a 7,000 Lempira loan to buy more products like hair color, shampoo, creams, straightening cream and other beauty products she uses in the salon and also to sell to her customers to provide better service and the best to her customers.  Her goal is that the business continues to grow and to move her family forward.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Ruth Johana

texts.es: Ruth, tiene 24 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos y vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Ruth desde muy joven le gusto realizar actividades de belleza, lleva 8 años de haber conseguido un local donde brinda el servicio de barbería, corte de pelo en general y venta de cosméticos. Ella ha sido cliente de ODEF en tres ciclos de préstamos con el actual, el cual lo utilizara para comprar herramientas como cepillos, peines, tijeras y para comprar cosméticos, champú, cremas, tintes para la venta. Esta inversión le ayudara a mantener producto para vender y para satisfacer a los clientes. Su meta es desarrollar más el negocio para obtener ingresos para el sustento diario de la familia y para sentirse realizada con su sueño.
texts.en:
Ruth, 24, is married and has two children and lives in the city of San Pedro Sula.  From a very young age Ruth has liked beauty activities.  She acquired a locale 8 years ago where she offers barber services; haircuts in general and the sale of cosmetics.  

She’s been an ODEF client for three loan cycles including the present one.  She will use it to buy tools like brushes, combs and scissors and also to buy cosmetics, shampoo, creams and hair color to sell.  This investment will help her have products on hand to sell and meet customer demand.  Her goal is to develop the business further in order to earn income for her family’s daily sustenance and to feel fulfilled in her dream.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies.

loans.name: Holman Miguel

texts.es: Holman de 32 años, empezó a trabajar de la edad de los 17, es estudiante de la carrera de ingeniería en sistemas, se desempeña como gestor de cobro con 48 horas laborales a la semana en una empresa privada, está solicitando apoyo de crédito para pagar el curso de titulación para poder culminar su carrera universitaria, ya que le gusta mucho su profesión y le interesaría llegar a ejercerla en empresas líder en el mercado para obtener mejor estabilidad económica para su familia y compartir sus conocimientos con la población.
texts.en: 32-year-old Holman started working at age 17. He's studying for a career in systems engineering. He works 48 hours a week as a collections manager for a private company. He's requesting a loan in order to pay for the fees needed to validate his college diploma, so that he can complete his higher studies. He enjoys his profession very much and he'd be interested in eventually practicing it in the leading companies.  That way his family can become more financially stable and he can share his knowledge with the public.

loans.use: to pay for fees in order to validate his college diploma.

loans.name: Rene Alfonso

texts.es: Rene Alfonso  de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y  sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, arroz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro de la agricultura y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el terreno donde cultivan esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, tiene mucha accesibilidad a la hora de trabajar, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por la calidad los buenos precios y el excelente servicio; Rene es un hombre emprendedor dedicado a su labor, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre esta a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo perdidas debido al clima y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Rene Alonso tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
René Alfonso, 39, lives with his life partner and his children.  He makes a living growing corn, rice, and beans.  He has been working in agriculture for several years and this has given him a lot of experience, allowing him to earn better income.

The plot of land he cultivates is located in an agricultural region very close to his home, so he has good access when it comes time to work.  He sells in all the surrounding areas of his community and has a lot of customers because the people prefer the quality of his products, the good prices, and his excellent service.

René's an enterprising man who is dedicated to his job and has a great desire to get ahead.  He's always hoping for new opportunities that allow him to succeed.

He had losses in the last planting season because of the weather and he wants to recover.  This is why he's requesting a loan from Integral to buy corn seed, beans, herbicide, etc.

René Alfonso has a good payment record and he's certain he'll be able to pay back the debt and also give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, beans, insecticide, and herbicide

loans.name: Rosa Adilia

texts.es:
Rosa, 36 años de edad, habitante de la comunidad El Bramadero, Teustepe, de oficio agricultora, con un nivel básico de primaria, madre de 2 hijos de 18 y 11 años de edad.
Empezó desde niña ayudando a sus padres en las labores de siembra. Al casarse ella junto con su esposo se dedicaron a cultivar granos básicos con los ingresos obtenidos puso una venta de mercadería tales como ropa. Actualmente siembra maíz, frijol y vende ropa.
Está solicitando el crédito para pagar mano de obra y compra de insumos para sembrar maíz  y también para comprar ropa para vender. Esto le permitirá darle un buen mantenimiento a sus cultivos y surtir su venta de ropa. Pues su expectativa es darle un techo digno a sus hijos y tener tierra para sembrar y producir más.
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old and is a resident of the community of El Bramadero, Teustepe.  She works in agriculture and has a basic level of elementary education.  She is the mother of two children who are 18 and 11 years old. 

She began as a child helping her parents in their work planting.  Upon marrying she and her husband dedicated themselves to cultivating basic grains.  With the income obtained she put up merchandise for sale such as clothing.  Currently she plants corn and beans and she sells clothing. 

She is requesting the loan to pay for labor and to buy supplies to plant corn and also to buy clothing to sell.  This will allow her to give good maintenance to her crops and stock up for her clothing sales.  Her expectation is to give her children a decent roof and to have land to plant and produce more.

loans.use: to pay for labor, to buy supplies to plant corn and also to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila, una humilde campesina y ama de casa de 52 años, casada, madre de 4 hijos, habitante de Teustepe. Lleva más de la mitad de su vida  trabajando en el campo. Actividad que aprendió de sus padres, luego al casarse continúo ejerciendo las mismas labores en compañía de su esposo y de sus hijos mayores.
Este solicitando el financiamiento para comprar abono, fertilizantes y plaguicida para darle un buen mantenimiento y protección a sus cultivos de maíz y frijol sobre todo ahora que está el invierno pues su expectativa es lograr vender toda su cosecha, cubrir los costos de producción y continuar sembrando para poder de educar a sus hijos menores que están estudiando y desea que tengan un mejor futuro que  ella.
texts.en:
Petronila is a modest countrywoman and housewife, is 52 years old, married, has four children, and lives in Teustepe. She has spent more than half of her life working in the land, activity that she learned from her parents. After getting married, she continued doing the same job in company of her husband and older children. 

She is requesting financing to buy manure, fertilizer, and pesticide to maintain and protect her crops of corn and beans, especially now in the winter time. Her expectation is to sell her entire crop, cover production costs and continue planting to be able to educate her youngest children who are studying. She hopes they have a better future than her.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain and protect her crops of corn and beans.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea es una mujer joven, que produce manualidades y bisuterìa, como forma de generar ingresos, para satisfacer sus necesidades: pago de estudios,gastos personales.
texts.en: Andrea is a young woman who makes crafts and costume jewelry as a way of generating income to meet her needs: to pay for schooling and her personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine and crafts-making supplies.

loans.name: Maryuri Eliett

texts.es:
El Sauce está ubicado a 90 km del departamento de León, es un bello pueblo rodeado de montañas florecidas y ríos caudalosos, donde la mayoría de sus casas son construidas con ladrillos de barro y techos de tejas, se caracteriza por tener hermosas mujeres trabajadoras y emprendedoras, como es el caso de la joven de 23 años Maryuri Eliett nacida y criada en este municipio con buenos principios y amor al trabajo que desde muy pequeña le enseñaron a defenderse y a ganar sus propios ingresos.

Inició su negocio hace dos años, de manera ambulante vendía ropa y zapatos y hoy en la actualidad tiene una tienda surtida de ropa, zapatos, bisutería ubicada en su casa de habitación donde tiene una gran demanda de los pobladores sobre todo los asalariados que visitan su negocio por su amabilidad y por el surtido que ofrece de estos productos.

Está solicitando este crédito para compra de zapatos, ya que es el producto de mayor demanda que más se le mueve en su negocio y necesita de capital para poder satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.

Agradece a KIVA y Ceprodel por el apoyo con estos pequeños créditos que ayudan a mejorar muchos negocios que necesitan de capital de trabajo para salir adelante y ser estables en el mercado.
texts.en:
El Sauce is located 90 kilometers from León Department.  It’s a beautiful town surrounded by flower-covered mountains and rushing rivers where most of the houses are made of clay bricks and tile roofs.  It’s notable for having hardworking, enterprising, beautiful women like Maryuri Eliett, 23.  She was born and raised here with good moral principles and a love of work that she was taught from a very early age in order to fend for herself and earn her own income.

She started her business two years ago.  She sold clothes and shoes from place to place and now has a store stocked with clothes, shoes and costume jewelry located at home.  Demand is high among the residents above all salaried employees who visit her store because of her kindness and because of the good assortment of goods she sells.

She’s requesting this loan to buy shoes because it’s the product most in demand and best-selling in her business and she needs capital to be able to meet customer demand.  She thanks Kiva and Ceprodel for the support from these small loans that help many businesses that need working capital to get ahead and become stable in the marketplace.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Henry Evenor

texts.es:
Henry, es originario de la comunidad Las Banderas ,Teustepe , 36 años de edad, casado padre de 2 hijos. Él se dedica a vender piedras de construcción. Inicio a los 14 años de edad como ayudante de camión al cumplir 18 años ya era chofer de camión, de poco en poco fue ahorrando , también con el financiamiento de una amigo logro comprar su primer camión. Que con el cual él trabaja actualmente vendiendo piedras de construcción.
El este requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar un turbo y un alternador de energía para su camión. El cual necesita tener en buenas condiciones para vender materiales de construcción como las populares ¨Piedras  Canteras ¨. En lo futuro le gustaría comprar otra camión y contratar a más personas ya que actualmente solo cuenta con un ayudante.
texts.en:
Henry is from the Las Banderas community in Teustepe.  He is 36 years old, married, and has two children.  He sells building stones.  He started as a truck helper when he was 14 years old.  When he turned 18, he was a truck driver.  He was saving little by little.  With additional help from a friend, he managed to buy his first truck, which he now works with selling construction stones.

He needs the loan to buy a turbine and an alternator for his truck.  He needs to have the truck in good condition in order to sell the popular construction materials like quarry stones.

In the future he would like to buy another truck and hire more people.  He currently only has one helper.

loans.use: to buy a turbine and an alternator for his truck.

loans.name: Alfredo Eduardo

texts.es:
Alfredo es un joven de 19 años de edad,. Vive en la carismática ciudad de chincha y digo carismática porque es una ciudad donde sus pobladores son muy alegres, asimismo se practica muchas danzas típicas peruanas como el festejo, la zamacueca, landó, entre otros. A Alfredo le gusta mucho investigar sobre plantas exóticas, pero lo que más le gusta es cuidar a los animales y por ello el se encuentra estudiando la carrera de medicina veterinaria.

Día a día Alfredo trabaja en su pequeño negocio de cultivo de flores de crisantemo, el trabaja alrededor de 6 horas al día ya que comparte su tiempo con sus estudios; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque vende producto de calidad.

Alfredo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracia a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar abono para sus flores, así como también poder preparar la tierra para sembrar mas crisantemos, lo que le permitirá tener más productos y mejorar la atención a sus clientes, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y que su negocio crezca
texts.en:
Alfredo is a young man of 19 who lives in the charismatic city of Chincha.  The city is charismatic because the people who live there are very cheerful.  They perform a lot of traditional Peruvian dances such as el festejo, la zamacueca, landó, etc.  Alfredo really enjoys researching exotic plants but what he most enjoys is caring for animals.  For this reason, he is studying for a degree in veterinary medicine.

Alfredo works in his small business growing chrysanthemums.  He works around 6 hours a day as he shares his time between work and his studies.  He believes that his business is doing well because he is very friendly with his customers and because he sells good-quality products.

Alfredo is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help that they provide, he will be able to buy manure for his flowers.  He will also be able to prepare his land to sow more chrysanthemums.  This means he will have more to sell and he will be able to improve his customer service.  He will be able to continue working hard to fulfill his biggest dreams: to finish his degree and to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers, and to prepare the land

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan is a 41-year-old married woman who supports four family members.  She is from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. 

She is requesting a loan of JD 600 to buy clothes and blankets to resell to her friends and neighbors in the same area where she wants to expand her products in other areas. In the future, she hopes to buy a home and to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy clothes and blankets to resell.

loans.name: Digna

texts.es:
Digna vive en el municipio de El Sauce, ubicado al occidente del departamento de León, es una señora de 48 años, casada, con 3 hijos, dos de ellas preparadas profesionalmente, las cuales  trabajan actualmente y uno que está estudiando con el objetivo que se preparen también.
 Gracias a su profesión como Enfermera que ha desempeñado por 25 años logró preparar a sus hijas las que hoy ya no dependen de ella y que son personas de bien, luchadoras y con buenos principios al igual que su madre.
También ha ido mejorando poco a poco su vivienda con todas las condiciones adecuadas con la ayuda de estos créditos para lograr su meta de dejarles un buen patrimonio a sus hijos para que tengan un techo digno donde vivir.

Está solicitando un crédito para terminar de construir la cocina con el fin de tener condiciones adecuadas para preparar la comida a su familia, con esto comprará  ladrillos, cemento, hierro, zinc.

Se siente muy agradecida y satisfecha por el apoyo que le ha brindado KIVA y Ceprodel  al financiarle con estos créditos que ayudan a cumplir sueños y metas que no se pudieran llevar a cabo con los bajos salarios que se gana en nuestro país.
texts.en:
Digna lives in the town of El Sauce, located in the western area of the department of León. She's a 48-year-old lady who's married with three children. Two of her daughters are professionally trained and they're currently in the workforce, and her son is studying in order to have a career as well.
Thanks to her career as a nurse, a line of work she's been in for 25 years, she has succeeded in educating her daughters. They no longer depend on her, and they're good, hardworking people with solid principles, just like their mother.
She has also been gradually improving her home and providing it with all the appropriate conditions, with help from these loans. She does this in order to achieve her goal of leaving a good heritage for her children, so that they have a decent home to live in.
She's requesting a loan in order to finish building the kitchen, so that she has the appropriate conditions to make food for her family. With the loan she'll purchase bricks, cement, iron and zinc.
She feels very thankful and glad that she has gotten the support of Kiva and Ceprodel which provided her with these loans. They help her achieve dreams and goals that couldn't have been realized with the low wages that are earned in her country.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, cement, iron and zinc in order to finish building a kitchen.

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es: Maximiliano de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de frijol y maíz, tiene muchos años de trabajar en el rubro y tiene basta experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva no es propio pero es apto para la siembra esta ubicado en una zona de alto potencial agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios pero sobre todo por el servicio inigualable; Maximiliano es un hombre dedicado a su labor, luchador y con muchas metas que desea alcanzar, esta trabajando duro día tras día pues sabe que solo así lograra el éxito que desea, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de frijol, maíz, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Maximiliano tiene buenas referencias de pago y e muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la ves confía en que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Maximiliano, 52 years old, lives with his life partner and children. He is a farmer. Specifically, he grows beans and corn. He has been doing this for many years and he has a lot of experience, which allows him to obtain the best harvests. The land he cultivates is not his own, but it is suitable for planting and is located in a high-potential farming area. He trades in all the areas around the community. He already has a lot of customers who prefer him because of the quality and good prices, but above all for the unequalled service. Maximiliano is a man who is dedicated to his work, a fighter with many goals he wants to reach. He is working hard day after day since he knows that this is the only way he will he achieve the success he desires. During the last planting season, he had some losses, and he wants to recover from them. That is why he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that allows him to buy bean and corn seed, manure, insecticide, tools, etc. Maximiliano has good payment references and is very responsible. He assures us that he will be able to pay the debt. At the same time, he is confident that he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy bean and corn seed, manure, insecticide, and tools

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre de 69 años quien cursó la escuela primaria, está casado con Ángela de 67 años. Viven juntos en la Parroquia San Rafael que se encuentra en el Cantón Otavalo de la Provincia de Imbabura. Otavalo es una ciudad muy atractiva por la diversidad de su cultura por lo que es muy concurrida por turistas nacionales y extranjeros quienes en cada visita disfrutan de paisajes, fiestas coloridas y las costumbres de sus habitantes indígenas y mestizos que provienen de legendarias historias y que han defendido su territorio desde siempre. Es un cantón muy rico económicamente pues desde sus antecedentes ancestrales, fue considerado el centro de la industria artesanal y actualmente estos productos son cotizados en todo el mundo.  También el turismo es una industria que aporta a la economía de esta ciudad, pues en la zona rural se pueden encontrar ríos, lagos, cascadas, bosques que son muy visitados. Por la afluencia de turistas, comerciantes y habitantes de la ciudad, en el centro de la ciudad se puede encontrar gran variedad de negocios que tienen el objetivo brindar todos los servicios para quienes pasan por la ciudad, estos negocios varían entre hoteles, hostales, restaurantes, cafeterías, papelerías, tiendas de ropa, alquiler de computadores, internet, etc. 
Es así como Manuel emprendió con la actividad de elaborar pan en horno de leña desde hace 30 años cuando sus padres le insertaron el interés por la experiencia que ellos tenían. Manuel invierte cada día mínimo 8 horas en la elaboración y venta de pan y también se las arregla para hacer alcanzar su tiempo con su actividad extra de crianza de animales domésticos. Con el fin de mantener la tradición de su familia y cumplir la demanda de los habitantes de la ciudad que siempre tienen una preferencia especial por el pan de “Don Manuel”, él procura mantener el negocio con la cantidad suficiente para abastecer todos los pedidos que le realizan. Por esta razón, Manuel acudió a Fundación Alternativa en busca de un préstamo cuyos fondos serán utilizados exclusivamente para la compra de harina e insumos para incrementar la producción. A pesar de la falta de educación, Manuel ha demostrado ser un buen administrador de su negocio y está seguro que la asesoría que brindan los ejecutivos de Fundación Alternativa le ayudarán a crecer con su negocio para que con los ingresos excedentes pueda tener un fondo de ahorro que le servirá para cubrir necesidades de su esposa y de él en los años de su vejez.
texts.en:
Manuel, 69, completed elementary school.  He’s married to Ángela, 67.  They live together in San Rafael Parish located in Otavalo Canton in Imbabura Province.  Otavalo is a city that’s very attractive because of its diverse culture; it’s very well-known by both national and foreign tourists who visit different vistas, colorful festivals and the culture of its indigenous and mestizo peoples that come from legendary histories and who have defended their territory since time immemorial. 


It is an economically rich canton because it’s been a center of craftsmanship since its most ancient origins and its products are today highly prized worldwide. Tourism is another industry that contributes to this city’s economy because in this rural zone can be found rivers, lakes, waterfalls and forests that are highly visited. Because of the high number of tourists, merchants and residents in the city, one can find downtown a great variety of businesses that have as their main goal to offer all services to those passing through the city. These businesses range from hotels to inns, restaurants to cafeterias, bookstores, clothing stores, computer rentals, Internet access, etc.


Manuel started his business baking bread in a wood-burning oven 30 years ago when his parents injected him with interest in the experience they had.  Manuel spends a minimum of 8 hours daily baking and selling bread and he also finds the way to stretch his time to spend in his extra activity raising domestic animals.  


Aiming at keeping his family’s tradition alive and to meet demand from his city’s residents who always have a special preference for “Don Manuel’s” bread, he tries to keep the business stocked with sufficient quantity to fill all orders placed.  Because of this, Manuel called on Fundación Alternativa to find a loan whose funds will be used exclusively to buy flour and supplies to increase production.


Despite his lack of formal education, Manuel has shown himself to be a good business manager and he’s sure that with the guidance from Fundación Alternativa executives he will be helped with the business so that he can use excess profits to start a savings account to cover his and his wife’s old-age needs.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and increase production.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide and herbicide.

loans.name: Cyprus Moro

texts.en:
Moro is a 42-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has five children between the ages of 3 and 14. Four of them go to school.
Moro runs a cloth and dressmaking business and has been in business for four years. He has no employee. He heard about Finance Sudan through promotions by the loan officers. He is taking a loan of 3,000 SDG to purchase cloth and many other items, In addition to this business, he has no other source of income. In five years, Moro would like to expand his business and open other branches. His major challenges include high transportation costs. Moro says he is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through the help of Kiva.

loans.use: to buy cloth, a sewing machine etc.

loans.name: Fazana

texts.en:
Ms Farzana is 36 years old  and the mother of four. 

Farzana is a famous tailor who stitches clothes for more than half of the community she lives in. She started this line of work almost 10 years ago when her husband fell ill and failed to support the family. So far, Farzana has been a successful tailor; her daughter also assists in cutting the cloth to complete the orders on time. Farzana knows the techniques of stitches very well and counts a good client list.  Her stitches are much appreciated in her community. 

However, because of increasing demand of customers and less capital in hand, she was facing difficulties in accomplishing the orders. It was due to these conditions that she contacted Kashf Foundation and decided to take a loan, instead of taking informal loan from the relatives. She is much satisfied with the support of Kashf foundation and now has requested a loan a second time. 

This time she needs a loan of Rs 30,000 to purchase another stitching machine for her daughter. In this way, Farzana, with the help of her daughter, would cater to more clients without delay. She is hopeful of earning more profits and wishes to use the part of revenue on home improvement.

loans.use: To purchase another stitching machine to meet demand consistently.

loans.name: Gulbodom

texts.en:
Gulbodom is 28 years old. She is not married and lives with her parents. She took the "to get ahead" course at a women's organization and learned business skills. She wants to organize her own business sewing women's dresses because she sews very beautiful women's dresses. 

Gulbodom is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy a sewing machine for setting up her new business. She promises to make her payments on time. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy sewing machine for organizing new business

loans.name: Jose Mauricio

texts.es:
José, está solicitando un préstamo para poder continuar prestando un buen servicio, él reparará las máquinas que utiliza para la confección de ropa y les dara mantenimiento, también realizara la compra de telas de diferentes colores, esta inversión le ayudará para poder tener lo necesario en el negocio.

El efecto que ha tenido con los prestamos es que posee su negocio mas estable, quiere continuar mejorando la elaboración de prendas de vestir, ha logrado mejorar también la atención a los clientes y mantener a su familia con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
José is asking for a loan in order to be able to continue offering a good service. He will repair the machines he uses to make clothing and will perform maintenance on them. He will also purchase fabric in different colors. This investment will help him to be able to have what he needs for his business.

The effect the loans have had on him is that his business is more stable. He wants to keep improving clothing production. He has also been able to improve customer service and to give his family everything they need.

loans.use: to repair and maintain machines and to purchase fabric

loans.name: Nadzua

texts.en:
Nadzua is married and with three children. She is a very hard-working person, eager to succeed and help her family.  She knows that life is hard, and working is the only way to get ahead.  

She says that she has had a charcoal store in her home for a year. It is well stocked. In addition to this business, she also has a kiosk selling basic household products. Both business are doing very well.

She is applying for the loan to buy sacks of charcoal and other supplies for her business, so she can continue providing good products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal, stocks of flour, and other fast-selling goods

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en:
Racheal is married and she has three children. She runs a very well-supplied small store, and she is a very hard-working and tenacious woman, always making efforts to get ahead in life. Rachael told us she started working in this field more than three years ago because there was a need for a charcoal general store in her neighborhood, and little by little she has been able to grow thanks to her job. She also has a kiosk selling foodstuffs.

She is requesting a loan to buy more sacks of charcoal. Thanks to this investment she will keep on selling high-quality products, consequently increasing her sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Mchemunda

texts.en:
Mchemunda is a married woman, with four children. She is a business owner who works selling household goods. She tells us that she has had this business for more than three years. 

Her business is located in a strategic place in Samburu, where she has a great number of customers. It is thanks to her work and her business that she has been able to help her family and give them all they need for a dignified life.

She is requesting the loan to stock her store with wheat flour, maize flour, rice and sugar, as she has a lot of demand for all this and wants to have her products in stock to be able to offer them to her customers. 

She thanks Yehu Microfinance Trust and Kiva for the opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to stock her store with wheat flour, maize flour, rice, and sugar.

loans.name: Sophie

texts.en:
Sophie is a 54-year-old single mother of two children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been operating a boutique for seven years and her business is located on the town's main street, thus attracting very many customers. After a failed marriage she realised that her wages could not sustain her needs and those of her children, so she acquired a loan and started a business. Her main dreams are to build a permanent home, buy a car and educate her children to university level, despite the challenges of inadequate capital to meet the different tastes and preferences of her customers.

Sophie intends to use this loan to buy bags, clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy bags, clothes and shoes to sell

loans.name: Friday

texts.en:
Friday is a 36-year-old married man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

He deals in cassava produce and has been in this business for eight years..He started with fifty thousand shillings only by buying dry cassava in small quantities and later generated a high income, which he used to buy a plot of land. 

The purpose for the loan is to buy cassava flour to sell. The main hardships that he faces are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to purchase stock for his customers. 

His personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent home for the family. He intends to expand the business to new market areas and to move the business to a more permanent home.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour to sell..

loans.name: Julissa Cindy

texts.es:
Cindy es una joven de 18 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener u  clima muy cálido y acogedor, así como también tiene muchos lugares turísticos, como “Las Islas Ballestas”, la cual recibe a muchos turistas en todo el año. Cindy es una joven muy trabajadora y sobre todo muy optimista, con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres, ya que ella nos comenta que es un gusto colaborar con ellos ya que le ha dado tanto a pesar de su condición humilde. Cuando Cindy tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho hacer deporte, especialmente le encanta jugar vóley con sus amigas y vecinas de su barrio, pero lo que mas le gusta es poder comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arro con Pato”.. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, ´pro le hubiera gustado estudiar enfermería.

Día a día Cindy trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa para damas caballeros y niños, ella trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 28 clientes ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece productos de buena calidad a precios cómodos.

Cindy esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias  a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como polos, pantalones, zapatillas, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá mejorar sus ingresos y podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa de material noble ya que actualmente es de adobe”.
texts.en:
Cindy is 18 years old. She lives in the city of Pisco, a city that is characterized for its very hot weather and being welcoming as well, there are many tourist attractions such as “the Ballestas Islands”, which receives many tourists throughout the year. Cindy is a very hardworking young woman and above all is very optimistic. With the fruits of her labour she supports her parents as she says it is a pleasure to contribute as they have given her much despite their humble conditions. 

When Cindy has free time she loves to play sports. She especially enjoys playing volleyball with her friends and neighbours in the neighbourhood, but what she likes the most is to eat one of her favourite dishes which is very delicious rice with duck. Due to her limited financial resources she could only study until fifth grade but she would have liked to study nursing.

Cindy works everyday in her small clothing store for women, men and children. She works about 10 hours a day and can attend to as many as 28 customers. She believes the business is doing well because she is very friendly to the customers and because she offers good quality products at affordable prices.

Cindy is very grateful to Kiva lenders; thanks to the help they have provided she can buy merchandise for her business such as shirts, pants, shoes among others. In this way she can increase her income and have a greater variety of products to offer her customer and to strive to make her biggest dream a reality: “to finish building her house with noble materials as it is currently made of adobe”.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (shirts, pants, shoes, among other items).

loans.name: Cornelio

texts.es: Cornelio de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y ha adquirido valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva tiene un alto potencial agrícola, esta apto para la siembra y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad de producto, los buenos precios pero sobre todo por el excelente servicio siempre a la disposición de los clientes; Cornelio es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, se dedica con gran esfuerzo y dedicación a su labor esta seguro que solo así logará el éxito que tanto desea; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas debido a los cambios de clima y quiere recuperarse pero para ello necesita de capital que lo respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Cornelio tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Cornelio, age 36, lives together with his life partner and their children in their own home. He grows corn and beans and has worked in agriculture for many years, gaining valuable experience that has allowed him to grow the best harvests. The fields where he grows have great agricultural potential, good for planting and very close to where he lives. He vends in all the areas surrounding the community and has many customers who prefer him because of the quality of his goods, the good prices, and above all for the excellent customer service. 

Cornelio is an enterprising man with a strong desire to get ahead, so he approaches his labor with a great deal of effort and dedication. He is sure that's the only way to achieve the success he strives for. Last season, he took some losses because of the weather and would like to make them up. However, in order to do that he needs more capital to back him up. That's why he's requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral [Kiva field partner] that will allow him to buy corn, beans, insecticides, herbicides, etc. Cornelio has a good payment history according to those who know him. He readily takes on the responsibility for paying off the loan and holds hope that it will provide his family a richer life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, insecticides, herbicides, etc...

loans.name: Paola Janhette

texts.es:
Paola tiene 28 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, es una ciudad ubicada en la hermosa selva peruana, se caracteriza por su flora y fauna diversa así como también la generosidad y  amabilidad de sus pobladores. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho jugar vóley con sus vecinas y amigas de su barrio, pero sobre todo le encanta disfrutar de uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo Ceviche.  Paola es madre de un pequeño d e5 años a l quiere muchísimo y por el cual ella se esfuerza cada día con tal de verlo feliz y sobre todo tenga más oportunidades que ella.

Con mucho esfuerzo y entusiasmo Paola trabaja como profesora de educación inicial, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque tiene mucha paciencia con los niños y porque le encanta lo que hace.

Paola está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar zapatos al por mayor para iniciar un pequeño negocio, con lo cual podrá tener un ingreso extra y así seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia y darle una buen calidad de vida a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Paola is 28 years old and lives in the city of Pucallpa, which is a city located in the beautiful Peruvian jungle. It is known for its diverse flora and fauna as well as for the generosity and kindness of its people. When she has some free time, she loves to play volleyball with her neighbors and friends from her neighborhood. But above all, she likes to enjoy one of her favorite dishes which is the delicious ceviche.

Paola is the mother of a small five years old child who she loves very much and for who she strives every day in order to see him happy and with more opportunities than her. With much effort and enthusiasm, Paola works as a professor of primary education. She works about nine hours a day. She believes she is doing well because she has a lot of patience with children and because she loves what she does.

Paola is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able to buy shoes in bulk to start a small business. With it, she will have an extra income and thus keep fighting every day to make her biggest dream a reality:"To have her own home and give a good quality of life to her son".

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Glendy Lorena

texts.es: Glendy Lorena de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; Ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de café tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro  y ha ganado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva es de alta incidencia agrícola y esta muy cercano a su vivienda muy accesible para trabajar, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque siempre posee lo que necesitan, con producto de calidad, a precios accesibles pero sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Glendy es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica y luchadora, todos los días se levanta dispuesta a lograr sus objetivos, se esfuerza al máximo pues sabe que así alcanzara el éxito que desea, en la ultima temporada de siembra no pudo obtener las ganancias esperadas por eso en este periodo de siembra quiere recuperarse y realizar una nueva inversión para ello le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de café, insecticida, herbicida, herramienta, etc. Glendy tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Glendy Lorena, age 29, lives with her life partner and their children. She works in agriculture, specifically in coffee cultivation. She has many years of experience in this, through which she has gained a lot of experience that helps her to produce only the best harvests. The fields where she grows are highly productive for agriculture and are very close to where she lives and easy to get to. She vends all over the community and in surrounding areas and has many customers who prefer her because she always has what they're looking for with a quality product, affordable prices, and above all excellent service.    

Glendy is an energetic and strong woman very dedicated to her work. Every day she wakes up ready to accomplish her goals and makes her best effort, as she knows this is how she will achieve the success she hopes for. Last season, she couldn't realize the profit she was anticipating, so this year she wants to make it up and make a new investment. That's why she's requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral [Kiva field partner] to buy coffee beans, insecticide, herbicide, tools, etc. Glendy has a good payment history and is certain that she will be able to pay back the loan on time. At the same time, she has faith that this will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy coffee beans, insecticide, herbicide, tools, etc.

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
For cultural reasons Muna prefers that her photo is not on the Internet.  Thus the above photo is of her husband. 

Muna is a 53-year-old married woman, with three family members, from Jabal Al-Hussain, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of JD 1,000 to buy clothes to resell.   Her son is working in a sewing shop. She wants to buy clothes from this factory to resell in shops at a cheap price. 

In the future, she wants to open a shop to show her products to increase her sales.  She hopes to increase her income to improve her health.

loans.use: to buy clothes to resell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 38 years old and a mixed crop farmer.  He is married to Mary, a farmer. They are blessed with two children. He has been in the farming business for the past two years, with a monthly income of KES 11,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his first loan with KADET LTD, after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Joseph will use the loan to buy a dairy cow. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
For cultural reasons, Manal prefers that her photo not be on the Internet.  Thus the above photo is of her husband. 

Manal is a 38-year-old married woman with two family members from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan.  

She is requesting a loan of JD 500 to buy materials for sewing, such as fabric, beads, and silk. She would like in the future to expand her project by opening a shop to show her products.  

She hopes to buy a new home for her family to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy fabric, beads, and silk for sewing.

loans.name: Kivanga

texts.en:
Kivanga is 54 years old and a business man. He is married to Petronila, a business lady. They are blessed with three children. He has been selling cereals for the past nine years with the monthly income of KES 18,000, which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his fourth loan from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully. Kivanga will use the loan to buy more stock of dry maize and beans.

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to start a venture with an electricity shop.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dry maize and beans.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan José de dieciocho años de edad vive junto a su familia, él se dedica al cultivo de frijol y a la pesca artesanal que le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva esta ubicado en una zona de alto potencial agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque tiene lo que necesitan a precios accesibles además de un buen servicio; Juan es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante todos los días se esfuerza al máximo por dar lo mejor de si en su labor esta seguro que así logrará el éxito; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse, por eso se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de frijol, insecticida, abono, etc. Juan José tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene confianza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Juan José, 18 years old, lives with his family. He grows beans and works in artisanal fishing, which helps him to contribute to the household expenses. He has done this work for some years, and this has given him a lot of experience, which allows him to obtain the best harvests. The land he cultivates is located in a high-potential agricultural area. He trades in all the areas around the community, and he has many customers, since people prefer him because he has what they need at accessible prices and also has good service. Juan is an entrepreneurial man with a lot of desire to move ahead. Every day he puts forth maximum effort to give the best of himself in his work. He is sure that he will achieve success this way. During the last season, he had some losses, and he wants to recover from them. This is why he decided to ask INTEGRAL for a loan that allows him to buy bean seed, insecticide, manure, etc. Juan José has good payment references. He assures us that he will be able to pay the debt. At the same time, he is confident that he will bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy bean seed, insecticide, and manure

loans.name: Gerber Antonio

texts.es: Gerber Antonio de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de frijol y también para complementar los  gastos del hogar es jornal y carpintero; los años trabajando en el rubro de la agricultura le han regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde cultiva esta ubicado en una zona de al incidencia agrícola muy accesible a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela pues vende productos de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Gerber es un hombre dedicado a su labor, luchador y con muchas ganas de salir adelante día a día se esfuerza al máximo por alcanzar el éxito y no piensa rendirse, en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse pero para la inversión necesita de capital y le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de frijol, insecticida, herbicida, abono, etc. Gerber Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Gerber Antonio, age 44, lives with his life partner and their children in their own home. He grows beans and also works as a carpenter and day laborer to keep up with the household expenses. The years he's spent farming beans have given him a lot of experience that helps him to grow only the best crops. The fields where he grows are located in a productive agricultural area that is easy to get to from where he lives. He vends all around the area of his community and already has a lot of customers, as he sells produce of the highest quality at affordable prices and with unequaled service. 
  
Gerber is a hard-working man dedicated to his work who has a big desire to get ahead. Day in and day out he makes his best effort to achieve success and never thinks of giving up. Last season he had some losses and would like to make them up this year. However, to make an investment he needs capital so he's requesting this loan from Apoyo Integral [Kiva field partner] that will allow him to buy beans, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizer, etc. Gerber Antonio has a good payment history and is sure that he can pay off the loan. At the same time, he has faith that this will afford his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy beans, insecticides, herbicides, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Rabab

texts.en: Rabab is a 53-year-old married woman who has three family members from Al-Bayader, Amman, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 700 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She wants to expand her home and to do maintenance of the home. In the future, she hopes to improve her living standard.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene veinte años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque todo lo que vende es de calidad, a precios bajos pero sobe todo con un servicio excelente; María es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor siempre dispuesta a salir adelante, busca las mejores oportunidades que le abran camino al éxito; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse con una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, etc. María del Carmen tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Maria del Carmen, 38, lives with her life partner and their children in her own home.  She is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans.  She's been farming for 20 years, and as a result she has a lot of experience that allows her to obtain better harvests.  She cultivates land that is located in an agricultural area, and is also very close to the town where she lives.  She sells in all of the areas surrounding her community, and she already has a lot of customers that prefer her because she sells good quality products at low prices with excellent service.  Maria is an enterprising woman; she is devoted to her work because she is always ready to get ahead, seeking the best opportunities to open a path toward success.  In the last season she had some losses, and she wants to recover with a new investment.  This is the reason she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn and bean seeds, manure, insecticides, etc.  Maria del Carmen has good credit references, and she is certain that she will be able to pay off the debt and at the same time, provide her family with a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, manure and insecticides

loans.name: Ameyo

texts.fr: Détentrice d’un restaurant depuis 2011, ameyo âgée de 47ans est mère de 03 enfants tous sur les bancs d’école. L’ainé a 16ans et le dernier 08ans. Afin de réaménager son bar- restaurant, elle fait recours à WAGES par un premier prêt. A l’avenir, elle voudrait agrandir son bar – restaurant, faire du service traiteur   et aider ses enfants au coté de son conjoint consultant gynécologue à mieux se scolariser.
texts.en: Owner of a restaurant since 2011, Ameyo, age 47, is the mother of 3 children, all of whom are attending school. The oldest is 16 years old and the youngest is 8. In order to renovate her bar-restaurant, she connected with WAGES [Kiva field partner] for her first loan. In the future, she would like to grow her bar-restaurant, start a catering service, and join her husband, a gynecologist, in helping her children get a better education.

loans.use: to renovate her bar-restaurant.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Mariée à un imprimeur, madame Afi est mère de 02 enfants. Un seul est scolarisé. Avec ce quatrième crédit qu’elle sollicite de WAGES, elle va acheter des céréales (activité qu’elle mène depuis 2008 à domicile) à Lomé et dans les autres  villes du pays. A l’avenir, elle veut ouvrir une boutique pour la commercialisation des céréales et permettre à sa famille de s’épanouir.
texts.en: Married to a printer, Ms. Afi is the mother of 2 children, only one of whom has been to school. With this 4th loan from WAGES [Kiva field partner], she will buy grains from Lomé and other cities around the country (a business she has been running out of her home since 2008). In the future, she wants to open a store to sell grains and allow her family to blossom.

loans.use: to buy grains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as seedlings and fertilizers for his farm.

loans.name: Matayo

texts.en:
Matayo used the previous loan to buy cocoa to sell and reaped tangible profits which he used to pay the loan and reinvest in the business. He is a 33-year-old married man with three children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He deals in the cocoa business, which he has been doing for five years.

The crop attracts high demand from both local and foreign consumers. Matayo is requesting another loan to buy cocoa to sell. He faces a challenge of the seasonal nature of the business, which hinders his development plan. His strategy is to diversify his business because dealing in a variety of crops would allow Matayo to spread his risks.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Janisia

texts.en:
Janisia is a 48-year-old widow, and is blessed with one child whom she supports.  She operates a small hotel in Narok and has been in the business for the past two years. Her monthly income is 25,000 KES; she plans to renovate the hotel with this loan.

She intends to use the anticipated profits to expand her business to an another open hotel. Her future dream is to be successful in life and business.

loans.use: to renovate her small hotel.

loans.name: Amos

texts.en:
Amos is a resident of Mariakani, Kenya. He owns a grocery shop which has been in operation for the last three years. He has two children. Amos started the business from the savings he made out of his casual jobs at construction sites. The business now hosts a vegetable and cereal shop. He has witnessed a great deal of sales but faces the challenge of lack of enough business space.

Amos is applying for a loan of 83,450 Kenya shillings to build a store for the new stock. 

The additional income from this loan will help Amos pay for his children’s school fees and also start other projects. His ambition is to become a wholesaler. He will save the additional income towards the purchase of a pickup van for the transportation of cereals.

loans.use: To build a store for his new stock.

loans.name: Edward Omar

texts.es: El joven Edward de 31 años estudiante de la carera de ingeniería en sistema empezó a laborar desde los 20 años, ahora se desempeña como promotor de crédito en una empresa privada, con su salario paga sus estudios universitarios, solicita crédito para pagar su curso de titulación ya que sus honorarios no le es suficiente para poder cancelar de un solo a como lo solicita la universidad, quien desea seguir estudiante para ser un gran profesional en la vida y brindar sus aportes a la comunidad.
texts.en:
Edward, a 31 year-old young man, is a student in systems engineering. He began working when he was 20 years old and is currently a credit counselor for a private company. He pays for his university studies with his salary. He is requesting a loan in order to pay his degree registration costs because the university wants him to pay them in one lump sum and his consultancy fees are insufficient to bear that expense. 
  
Edward wants to continue studying to become a big professional in life and make a contribution to the community.

loans.use: to pay his degree registration fees.

loans.name: Maria Reyna

texts.es: María Reyna de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su hijo en casa propia; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz, a la venta de ganado y además posee un pequeño molino que le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar,  tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y  eso le ha dado experiencia valiosa que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno esta ubicado en una  zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad, lo precios y el servicio excelente; María es una mujer activa, luchadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante y triunfar día con día se esfuerza al máximo porque sabe que de esa forma podrá lograrlo; como toda buena comerciante desea aumentar sus ganancias por eso decidió aumentar la inversión pero para ello necesita de capital y le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permite comprar  vacas. María Reina tiene buenas referencias de pago, segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza de que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: María Reyna, 55 years old, lives with her son in her own house. She grows corn and sells cattle, and she also has a small mill that helps her contribute to the household expenses. She has been doing this work for some years, and that has given her valuable experience, which helps her to obtain the best harvests. The land is located in a high-potential agricultural area and is very close to her house. She trades in all the surrounding areas, and she already has many customers who prefer her because of the quality, the prices, and the excellent service. María is an active woman, a fighter with a lot of desire to move ahead and succeed. Day after day she gives maximum effort because she knows that this is how she will be able to achieve it. Like any good businessperson, she wants to increase her earnings. This is why she decided to increase investment, but for that she needs capital, and she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow her to buy cows. María Reina has good payment references. She assures us that she will be able to pay the debt. At the same time, she hopes that she will bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Samart's Group

texts.en:
A 27-year-old mother of two kids who are still in school, Samart is a rice farmer on two and a half hectares of farmland. Her husband also helps to generate additional income through catching fish to sell. She has worked in crop husbandry for five years and earns about 15,000 KHR per day. 

Samart's group consists of three female members and she is a group leader. She has been with VisionFund for one cycle and paid back the loan successfully. The loan helped support her business and reduced the financial burden on her family. 

Samart and one of her group members are seeking a loan of 800,000 KHR each, whereas the remaining member is applying for 1,000,000 KHR. As the group leader, her portion will be used to purchase rice seed and fertilizer for cultivated land. She believes that her business will return a good profit so she can keep all of her children in school.

loans.use: to buy rice seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 52 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y muy alegre, es conviviente con Héctor con quien tiene solo un hijo, pero ella tiene 5 hijos de su anterior pareja, vive en su casa propia junto a 4 de sus hijos quienes ya están alcanzando la mayoría de edad y comparten con ella el deseo de forjarse un mejor futuro de vida por el bien de cada miembro de su familia. La actividad que realiza María es la venta de bebidas gaseosas y cocos. Tiene un puesto ambulatorio ubicado en el puerto pesquero de la ciudad en donde frecuentemente transitan personas en busca de refrescar el intenso calor que provoca las altas temperaturas. Instala una mesa con un congelador portátil y ahí coloca los productos que vende para su adecuada congelación hasta el instante que el cliente viene a comprarle. Vende cocos pelados cuya pulpa es muy consumida o también vende el fruto entero que es solicitado por su deliciosa y fresca agua dulce. Lleva en este negocio más de 2 años y trabaja en ocasiones con la ayuda de su pareja. Comenta que lo que le agrada de su actividad son las ganancias que percibe diariamente ya que con este producto siempre tiene los ingresos económicos necesarios para apoyar a su cónyuge con las gastos de su hogar, lo que no le gusta es que algunas veces algunos clientes le faltan el respeto cuando se encuentran en estado etílico, ya que lamentablemente en la zona donde trabaja existen muchos bares donde venden mucho licor, sin embargo, ha aprendido a manejar este tipo de situaciones y siempre logra salir airosa, espera conseguir un local donde pueda vender con mayor comodidad y donde tenga principalmente la seguridad de la que hoy carece. Este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas como lo hizo en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos los integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de más gaseosas de distintas marcas, sabores y tamaños, además comprará algunos artículos como sorbetes y bolsas para dar un mejor servicio en la venta de cocos.
texts.en:
María, who is 52 years old, is an entrepreneurial, hard working and very happy woman. She lives with her spouse, Héctor, with whom she has only one child, but she has 5 children from her previous partner. She lives in her own home with four of her children, who are growing up and share with her the desire to create a better quality of life for the future, for each one of the family members. To earn income Maria sells sodas and coconuts. She has a transportable sales stand, located in the fishing port of the city, where people frequently pass by looking for something refreshing, due to the intense heat which is brought on by the high temperatures. 

She has a table with a portable ice box which is where she puts the products she will sell, so that they are kept cold up until the point the customer buys them. She sells peeled coconuts, so that the meat of the fruit can be eaten, and she also sells whole coconuts which are requested for the delicious and fresh coconut milk. She has had this business for over two years. She sometimes has the help of her husband. She said that what she likes about her job, is the income she sees each day, because with this product she always has the necessary income to be able to support her spouse with the household expenses. What she does not like about her job is that sometimes she has customers who are disrespectful because they are intoxicated. Sadly, in the area where she works there are many bars where a lot of liquor is sold. However, she has learned how to handle these types of situations and she always succeeds in handling things gracefully. She hopes to find a location where she can sell more comfortably, that first and foremost offers the security she is currently lacking. 

This is the third loan she has taken out through MFP. She is thankful to all of the people who make her loans possible, to continue working with improved outcomes. She promises, once again, to make her payments on time like she has done with her previous loans. She is also thankful to be a part of her communal bank, because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. With the amount of 1000 nuevos soles she has requested, she will invest in the purchase of more sodas, of a variety of brands, sizes and flavors. She will also buy straws and plastic bags, so that she can provide better service with her coconut sales.

loans.use: to buy sodas, of different brands, flavors and sizes as well as straws and plastic bags so that she can provide better service with her coconut sales.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Geofrey

texts.en: Geofrey is 32 years old, married with four children and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. For three years he has been buying produce and with the income earned he has been able to pay school fees for his children and renovate his house. He got the capital from his returns on agriculture. His main hardships are having inadequate capital to purchase stock for his customers and seasonal changes. Geofrey's personal goal is educating his children while his business goals are to expand to new market areas and hire employees to expand the business. He intends to use the loan to buy cassava flour and coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy cassava flour and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Gombosuren

texts.en:
Mr. Gombosuren is 53 years old and has been working on railroads since 1998. Before this job he worked as a tractor driver. Gombosuren lives with his wife and two sons in their small wooden house in Kherlen, the largest city in the eastern province of Mongolia. He is the one who earns income for his family. His older son is 23 years old and has autism so his wife doesn’t have time to work, and his younger son is 20 years old and serves in the military. Although Gombosuren’s family has a low income, they live a life full of happiness. 

Gombosuren is requesting 1,500,000 MNT to complete construction of his new house. His old house is in incredibly bad condition. The roof is especially bad and water enters the house through the roof when it rains. Due to a lack of money and the old age of the house, it has never been properly maintained. He was told that it would take ten tons of coal to overcome the cold days of winter, meaning that this amount of carbon dioxide would be emitted into the environment. Gombosuren says it will cost the same to build a new house as it would to fix the old house, so he has decided to build a new comfortable house with low coal usage in order to help save the environment.

loans.use: To complete his new house

loans.name: Cohen

texts.en: Cohen is a 30 year old married man with seven children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He has been in the retail business for one and a half years. He started this business with his salary earnings and sales of crop produce. He is challenged by price fluctuations and high taxes. His personal goals are a sustainable livelihood, a profit earning business and educating his children. The purpose of this loan facility is to pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school fees.

loans.name: Khitam

texts.en: Khitam is a 19 year old married woman who supports two family members from Jarash Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 400 JD to pay for her home improvements that she would like to do.  She wants to perform maintenance on her kitchen. In the future, she hopes to provide a good environment to live in. Since Khitam is under 30 year old her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en: Juma is a thirty eight year old windowed lady with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her main goal is to educate her children and buy a car. She has owned a retail shop for ten years, and her main hardships are: customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to buy stock. Besides that, she has a vision of expanding her business to new markets. Juma needs a loan to buy more soap, sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy more soap, sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Edson

texts.en: Edson is a 54-year-old married man who has seven children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He has been a farmer for over 20 years. His main hardships are inadequate capital, price fluctuations and changes in seasons. He has a dream of educating his children and building a permanent home for them, while his business goals are buying land to grow crops and hiring employees to help expand his business. Edson wants this loan in order to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Ibtisam

texts.en: Ibtisam is a 49-year-old married woman who supports three family members from Al Russeifeh, Jordan. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to pay for her home improvements. She would like to do maintenance on the home and to buy some household items. In the future, she hopes to provide a good environment for her family to live in.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a very hard working woman who always wants to get ahead. She is in the business of raising and selling chickens, a business that has enabled her to sustain her family and support her children's education. She is asking for this loan to pay school fees for her daughter who is in college. 

Beatrice hopes to see her child graduate and have a better future. She thanks you for the previous loan that improved her living standards.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her daughter who is in college.

loans.name: Kanze

texts.en:
Kanze is a resident of Kongowea of Coast Province, Kenya. She has five grown-up children; only one still attends school. She owns a food cafe – a business that she has been operating for seven years. She sells rice, beans, potatoes, etc. Her main challenge is low income during low season.

Kanze learnt about Milango through an employee. She aims to access credit to improve the operation of her business. Kanze is applying for a loan of 21,050 Kenyan shillings to purchase some flour, sugar, cereals, cooking oil and potatoes for the cafe. The extra income from this loan will be added to her savings to improve the standard of living of her family. She aspires to open a big restaurant in the future.

loans.use: to buy some flour, sugar, cereals, cooking oil and potatoes for the cafe.

loans.name: Housein

texts.en:
Housein is from Iraq. He is 36 years old, is married, and has three children. He is the only provider for the family.

Housein owns a shop for sportswear. He established his business in 2010 in an area where competition doesn’t exist. He learned this trade while working with his friend in the same field. He now has a good reputation in his local community.

He is requesting a $2400 loan to renovate the shop and increase his inventory. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and increase his inventory.

loans.name: Rat's Group

texts.en: Rat is a farmer who lives in a rural area of the Bakan district of Pursat province, Cambodia. She is 26 years old and married. She has two children who are dependent on her. Rice farming on one hectare of farmland is the main source of her family’s income. She also supplements the income by selling fish pastes while her husband works for another person for a fee. Having been in this for several years, she is able to earn around 80,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 30,000 KHR each day after deducting daily expenses. Flooding is the main challenge for her business. Rat is in her first microloan with VisionFund (Kiva's partner). Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan of 800,000 KHR each. Rat will use her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business so she can keep up a good progress of her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de comestibles,la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche y galletas,la socia trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años ne este negocio,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de comestibles.La socia solicita le credito para comprar arroz,azucar,leche y galletas.

La socia esta feliz con el prestamo otorgado y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.
texts.en:
The borrower continues to make her living at her grocery store business.  She sells basic need items like rice, sugar, milk, and crackers.  She works from 5am until 10pm.  She's been in this business for several years, and her dream is to expand her grocery store business.  

She is requesting this loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and crackers.  She is happy with this loan granted to her and commits herself to paying the installments.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and crackers.

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es:
